title: Trump’s Silence on World AIDS Day Revives a New Lavender Scare
description: Last month, the State Department warned employees not to commemorate World AIDS Day through official work accounts, including social media, nor should they use government funds to mark Tuesday, Dec. 2, as World AIDS Day. The day came and went in a quiet, cold…
content:
A die-in and speakout by ACT UP New York to draw attention to World AIDS Day, on Nov. 29, 2017, in Times Square. (Erik McGregor / LightRocket via Getty Images)
